controllers.service

Class MembershipService

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.service.BaseService
      • controllers.service.MembershipService

  • public class MembershipService
extends BaseService
    Service for User Entity
    Author:
    Konstantinos Christofilos , Pavlos Gerardos , Sokratis Pantazaras

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MembershipService() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Membership createMembership(Activity activity, User user)
      Calls createMembership(Activity, User, Date) By default passes current system date
      Membership createMembership(Activity activity, User user, java.util.Date registrationDate)
      Creates new Membership object and attaches it to the database Prerequisites: - the user cannot be an administrator - this user is not already signed up for this activity - only one tutor can participate in each activity - this activity's sessions must not clash with any sessions of other activities that the user is already registered for
      boolean deleteMembership(Membership membership)
      Deletes membership Prerequisites: - there are no registers linked to this membership
      java.util.List<Membership> findAllMembershipsByActivity(Activity activity)
      Finds all memberships for a specific activity
      java.util.List<Membership> findAllMembershipsByUser(User user)
      Finds all memberships for a specific user
      Membership findMembership(Activity activity, User user)
      Find a membership by its key (activity, user)
      boolean updateMembership(Membership membership)
      Updates membership

      • createMembership

        public Membership createMembership(Activity activity,
                          User user)
        Calls createMembership(Activity, User, Date) By default passes current system date

      • createMembership

        public Membership createMembership(Activity activity,
                          User user,
                          java.util.Date registrationDate)
        Creates new Membership object and attaches it to the database Prerequisites: - the user cannot be an administrator - this user is not already signed up for this activity - only one tutor can participate in each activity - this activity's sessions must not clash with any sessions of other activities that the user is already registered for
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity to sign up for
        user - the user to sign up for the activity
        registrationDate - the date of enrollment
        Returns:
        Membership|null The created Membership object or null

      • updateMembership

        public boolean updateMembership(Membership membership)
        Updates membership
        Parameters:
        membership -
        Returns:
        true if update successful, false otherwise

      • deleteMembership

        public boolean deleteMembership(Membership membership)
        Deletes membership Prerequisites: - there are no registers linked to this membership
        Parameters:
        membership -
        Returns:
        true if deletion successful, false otherwise
